overview.en: MineBit (https://www.minebit.com) is a Korean Community-Based Revenue Sharing Exchange. Based on the consensus of “Community-Based Revenue Sharing Mechanism”, MBT holders are like community nodes, which will build a co-ownership, co-sharing and co-governance community organization to share platform benefits.
overview.zh: MineBit ( https://www.minebit.com )是韩国社区共享型数字资产交易所，致力于创建一个自治的、高效的、透明公平的数字资产交易平台，让投资者可以放心地进行任何规模的交易。与此同时，通过创新的治理机制将平台话语权交给社区，同时借助社区的力量挖掘、反哺最有潜力、最有价值的项目，形成一个正向激励的生态环境。
